product_name: Deuter Race Bike Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: Offering stay-put, comfortable performance for any sort of ride, the Deuter Race Bike Hydration pack carries 3 liters of water and includes a rain cover for protecting the pack's contents. Includes BPA-free Streamer 3 liter (100 fl. oz). hydration reservoir with drink tube for on-the-go hydration. Adjustable, highly breathable and anatomically shaped mesh shoulder straps have anti-chafe pads for comfort. Airstripes back panel has contoured, mesh-covered pads designed to cover no more than 5-10% of your back to ensure maximum air circulation and stability. Attached mesh waistbelt stabilizers help keep the pack secure when riding over uneven surfaces. Raincover can deploy at a moment's notice to help keep your gear dry; when not in use, it can be detached or stowed away in bottom zippered pocket. The Deuter Race Bike Hydration pack features a small zip front pocket and a side mesh drop-in pocket. 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective details on the front, sides and back of pack increase your visibility in low light.
